segments.text: This scene is heartbreaking in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her chore, missing everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's flooding the sink, ruining the floor beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be devastated when she realizes the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body stretched out like that tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is innocent, just wanting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this secrecy could lead to trouble for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts the potential sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching their unaware risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a quiet tragedy unfolding slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, caught in this oblivious moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them gently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a tender, yet worrisome sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
